title: Plastic Man vs. Superman : r/whowouldwin - Reddit
body: Plastic Man vs. Superman. Plastic Man is pretty pissed that his son was locked up by the Justice League, and vows to take revenge on their leader: Superman. RD:1 No prep time, fight takes place in Metropolis. RD:2 Superman gets a day of prep time. Bonus Round: Plastic Man takes on the rest of the Justice League all at once, can he come out on ...
